categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Trok was a female Sith pureblood Sith Lord during the Cold War and Galactic War. She overthrew a crime syndicate on Nar Shaddaa and started moving its members to Dromund Kaas. Unable to find concrete evidence against her, Officer Manus used the Bounty Brokers Association to put a bounty on her head.

Lord Trok first appeared in Game Update 2.3 of the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2013. She is only accessible through the Bounty Contract Week event quest series of the Empire players in the game on Dromund Kaas.
